I had been atheist. Recently I was Covid+ and was in critical condition with 60-65 oxygen level and on oxygen support mostly. A friend sent me this link. I heard this song more than 100 times along with few other bhajans too. 6 out of 9 patients died in my ward but I survived. My lungs are still damaged but I am fine now and at home. I dont know how exactly it happened but I want to visit Ayodhya once and thank Ram for not just saving me but saving a father of 4 years old and an unborn baby.
